## <u>Epidemiology & Biostat</u>

#### [Epidemiology: An Introduction](https://global.oup.com/academic/product/epidemiology-9780199754557?cc=ca&lang=en&)
by Ken Rothman

[Companion Site](https://global.oup.com/us/companion.websites/9780199754557/)

#### [Epidemiology By Design: A Causal Appoach to the Health Sciences](https://global.oup.com/academic/product/epidemiology-by-design-9780190665760?cc=us&lang=en&)
by Daniel Westreich

#### [Modern Epidmiology 3rd Ed](https://shop.lww.com/Modern-Epidemiology/p/9781451190052)
By Rothman, Greenland and Lash

The [First Edition](https://www.amazon.com/Modern-Epidemiology-Kenneth-J-Rothman/dp/0316757764) and [2nd Edition](https://books.google.ca/books/about/Modern_Epidemiology.html?id=cL3zwIFHB7cC&redir_esc=y) are also excellent!

#### [What If, Causal Inference](https://www.hsph.harvard.edu/miguel-hernan/causal-inference-book/)
by Miguel Hernan and Jamie Robins

[PDF](https://cdn1.sph.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/1268/2020/02/ci_hernanrobins_21feb20.pdf)


#### [Statistical Rethinking](https://xcelab.net/rm/statistical-rethinking/)
by Richard McElreath

#### Probability
by Joseph Blitzstein and Jessica Hwang

Version 1 [PDF](http://dl.rasabourse.com/Harvard%20Statistics.pdf)
Version 2 [PDF](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1VmkAAGOYCTORq1wxSQqy255qLJjTNvBI/view)

#### [Regression Modeling Strategies](http://biostat.mc.vanderbilt.edu/wiki/Main/RmS)
by Frank Harrell

#### [Applied Longitudinal Data Analysis](https://content.sph.harvard.edu/fitzmaur/ala2e/)
by Fitzmaurice, Laird and Ware

#### [An introduction to Statistical Learning](http://faculty.marshall.usc.edu/gareth-james/ISL/)
by James, Witten, Hastie, And Tibshirani

[PDF](https://www.ime.unicamp.br/~dias/Intoduction%20to%20Statistical%20Learning.pdf)
